amendment.description: To prohibit certain reductions to the inventory of E-3 airborne warning and control system aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3439 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3439 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 3748. To prohibit certain reductions to the inventory of E-3 airborne warning and control system aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3439 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3439 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 3748.
